import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import { Container, Button, Table, Form, Spinner } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './AdminDashboard.css'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const [filteredLearners, setFilteredLearners] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [searchRollNo, setSearchRollNo] = useState(''); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('info'); const reportRef = useRef(); const handleSearch = () => { if (!searchRollNo) return; setLoading(true); fetch('https://sheetdb.io/api/v1/131pnl5khpeib') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { const filtered = data.filter( (learner) => learner.RollNo && learner.RollNo.trim() === searchRollNo.trim() ); setFilteredLearners(filtered); setLoading(false); }) .catch((err) => { console.error('Error fetching learner data:', err); setLoading(false); }); }; return (

Ahmedabad Centre

setSearchRollNo(e.target.value)} /> {loading ? (
) : filteredLearners.length > 0 ? (
{activeTab === 'info' && ( <>
Learner Information
Learner Name Batch Roll No Contact Session
{filteredLearners[0]["Student Name"]} {filteredLearners[0].Batch} {filteredLearners[0].RollNo} {filteredLearners[0]["Contact No"]} 2025-26
)} {activeTab === 'attendance' && ( <>
Attendance Report
APRMAYJUNJUL AUGSEPOCTNOV DECJANFEB
{filteredLearners[0].APR} {filteredLearners[0].MAY} {filteredLearners[0].JUN} {filteredLearners[0].JUL} {filteredLearners[0].AUG} {filteredLearners[0].SEP} {filteredLearners[0].OCT} {filteredLearners[0].NOV} {filteredLearners[0].DEC} {filteredLearners[0].JAN} {filteredLearners[0].FEB}
)} {activeTab === 'exams' && ( <>
Performance Report
{filteredLearners.map((learner, idx) => ( ))}
S.NO. Date Test Phy Chem Math Bio Total % Rank Max
{idx + 1} {learner["Exam Date"]} {learner["TestName"]} {learner["Phy"]} {learner["Chem"]} {learner["Math"]} {learner["Bio"]} {learner["Total"]} {learner["%AGE"]} {learner["Rank"]} {learner["Max. Marks"]}
)}
) : ( searchRollNo &&
No data found for Roll No: {searchRollNo}
)}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
